author: Reuters Editorial
title: REFILE-BRIEF-Sanford Says Stuart Houliston, Group Financial Controller, To Be Acting CFO
text:
(Corrects headline to add “says”)
Feb 12 (Reuters) - Sanford Ltd:
* STUART HOULISTON, GROUP FINANCIAL CONTROLLER, TO BE ACTING CFO
* ‍CLEMENT CHIA APPOINTED TO COO FROM CFO​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (bangalore.newsroom@thomsonreuters.com)
